Docs.summary: Indicates whether the sort order for data points is ascending or descending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The PointSortOrder enumeration represents the order of the sort to be performed on data point values. It is used with the `Sort` method definitions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that include a `pointSortOrder` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder Ascending = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Ascending sort order, that is, smallest to largest values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder Descending = int32(1)
